name: Jamie Bettison
info: I have been teaching English online to professionals and students now for the past 8 years and I love it! I am fluent in Spanish and I love to exercise. I teach IELTS, Business English, Resume/CV Editing , Interview Preparation and Conversation. Come check out a class!
